sponsoredLegislation.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Speaker of the House should appoint an independent prosecutor to investigate fully the current allegations concerning drug abuse and sexual misconduct by members of the House of Representatives and pages.

latestAction.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

sponsoredLegislation.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should take all possible actions to collect the amount of any overcharges resulting from Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, and to enforce the orders, rules, and regulations relating thereto.
